articles.author: Ian Doyle
articles.title: FSG face Liverpool transfer change after John Henry apology - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: In the latest Blood Red, Ian Doyle looks at a very clear way in which FSG can show Liverpool they truly are sorry for European Super League call
articles.content:
The longer the fallout from the aborted European Super League proposal continues, the more mind-blowingly baffling the whole idea becomes.

articles.author: Matthew Briggs
articles.title: Klopp pleads with Liverpool fans over FSG; brands new CL format 'a joke' - Teamtalk.com
articles.description: Jurgen Klopp branded the new Champions League format "a joke" as he pleaded with Liverpool's fans not lose faith in the club's owners after the bungled European Super League plan.
articles.content:

articles.title: Vaccine rollout Ireland: Ireland supporting EU's legal case against Astrazeneca over Covid-19 vaccine shortfalls – Health Minister Stephen Donnelly - Independent.ie
articles.description: The European Commission has contradicted Stephen Donnelly’s assertion that they have initiated a legal case against AstraZeneca over their failure to meet vaccination deadlines.
